Nighlight is  a lost protophorm from the Beast wars, her pod was buried du=
e that she wasnt found till some years ago since then she was active.
 
Per=
ceptor is a old decepticon rebuilt as  predacon, he came to earth (I dont r=
emember the circunstances) and he wasnt involved the war between Autobots a=
nd decepticons.
 
Windlord is another lost protophorm but he was active aft=
er Maximals and Preds left the earth and neo beast wars started.
 
Talon is=
 a unicronian by origin but she defected and was rebuilted as maximal.
 
El=
ita born as any biological creature

 our

hings that are thrown in for

dence.

rime,

ou

> On 8/25/11, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wrote:

g question.

t he's quite a bit

r, Straight Shot, who
> > probably were transported off Cybertron and near =
Atlantis so is to allow

injuries. Tucson was taken
> > off line after he got pegged by Cyclonus and=
 was in some sort of Stasis lock
> > for a couple of vorns. Then he travels=
 to Ancient Earth with Perseus.
> >
> > Nightshift is also G2, how he got t=
o Ancient Earth was probably due to the
> > fact that as a pretender, he ha=
d connections even with Decepticon forces,
> > and somehow hitched a ride w=
ith them, ending up on Ancient Earth.
> > Nightshift is definitely built wi=
th a vehicle alt form, and he finds it hard
> > to adapt, but does the best=
 he can under his circumbstances.
> >
> > That's the best I can think of fo=
r now.

aracters. So many
> >> of us I think have created characters on the fly and=
 have inserted

er by someone

ld think that after all this time it is safe to assume
> >> that no matter =
how we got the character, these characters are
> >> completely ours now. So=
 now we can create, reboot or whatever our
> >> character's history so that=
 they chime in with our portrayals of them.
> >>

> >>

r character come from G1/G2 time frame and some how appear

hey live through the great war and transport to old Earth
> >> from the fut=
ure Beast Wars time frame or were they constructed
> >> somewhere else?
> >=
>
> >> If they did have a vehicular alt mode, why have they maintained it o=
n
> >> Ancient Earth where there are no roads?
> >>
> >>
> >> All questions=
 to ask ourselves about our characters. These are all
> >> ways we can expa=
nd our knowledge of the characters we play - whether
> >> we created them o=
r given to us, and I look forward to the answers.
